subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Related to {{och-l|振|id=2|to shake}}, probably from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*dar ~ d(u/i)r||to tremble; to shiver}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} [[thunder]]
# {{†}} {{lb|zh|of lightning}} to [[strike]]
# to [[tremble]]; to [[shake]]; to [[jolt]]; to [[quake]]
# [[earthquake]]
# {{†}} to be [[excited]]; to be [[aroused]]; to be [[shocked]]
# {{†}} to [[stir]]; to [[invigorate]]
# {{†}} [[power]]; [[prestige]]; [[dignity]]
# {{†}} to [[fear]]; to tremble
# {{†}} the [[east]]
# 4th of the 8 [[w:Ba Gua|trigrams]]
# 51st [[hexagram]] of the [[I Ching]]
# {{zh-div|國}} {{lb|zh|historical}} [[Jin]]; [[Zhen]] {{gloss|original name of the [[Balhae]] state}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
